scripts.build: rimraf dist/ && parcel build src/index.js --no-cache --target browser --out-dir dist/41SLSP_NETWORK-CENTRAL_PACKAGE/js --out-file custom.js
scripts.watch: rimraf dist/ && parcel watch src/index.js --no-cache --target browser --out-dir dist/41SLSP_NETWORK-CENTRAL_PACKAGE/js --out-file custom.js
scripts.package: yarn build && cd dist && zip -r ./* ../package/41SLSP_NETWORK-CENTRAL_PACKAGE.zip && cd -
